title: DiamondGroup4
author: DiamondGroup4
content: Hi,I have a lot of experience in coding and blockchain technology, I'm looking for a job right now and am open to do anything that I am capable of doing. If you need help with anything or want to talk please message me on my Telegram: @DiamondMinded

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: DiamondGroup4 on October 11, 2022, 03:57:43 PMHi,I have a lot of experience in coding and blockchain technology, I'm looking for a job right now and am open to do anything that I am capable of doing. If you need help with anything or want to talk please message me on my Telegram: @DiamondMindedYou might have more success if you listed what you're capable of.  Perhaps what programming languages you know and how much experience you have with each.  You could even supply some references or examples of your previous work so that people get an idea of what sort of product you produce.  Finally, this is the goods section and you aren't selling goods so I don't think you'll get much interest here.  Try moving this to the services section and I think people will be much more likely to find it and consider hiring you.  Good luck.
